context: Have you read any of Brett Helquist books? Which ones do you recommend?
Brett Helquist wrote the Reptile Room. Do you want to read it?
Reptile Room sounds interesting to read. What kind of book is it?
The Reptile Room is a novel also written by Lemony Snicket.
is this a mystery type of book?
No, it is a novel. Would you like a recommendation for a mystery instead?
yes please because I just love mystery books and novels.
resp: A mystery recommendation is Violets are Blue which is a thriller as well.
